File libsrc/libmath/toeplitz.c

Public Function Index

toepinv (int, float *, float *)
Compute the inverse a toeplitz matrix.
toeplitz (int, float *, float *, float *)
Solve a toeplitz matrix equation.

Public Functions

toepinv 
 int toepinv(int m,
             float *r,
             float *rinv)
Compute the inverse a toeplitz matrix. Compute the inverse of the input m x m symmetric toeplitz matrix r by calling the routine toeplitz m times to solve the equation R*F = G, for G equal to each column of the identity matrix I. (R * RINV = I) rinv = m x m symmetric matrix (stored as a vector).

Returns:
0 for success, -1 if r[0] is 0., -2 for a malloc error. logErrorMsg is called if the return is nonzero.
toeplitz 
 int toeplitz(int m,
              float *r,
              float *g,
              float *f)
Solve a toeplitz matrix equation. Using toeplitz (Levinson) recursion, solve the matrix equation R*F = G, where R is a symmetric m x m toeplitz matrix with elements 
 
 		r[0]	r[1]	r[2]	. . .	r[m-1]
 		r[1]	r[0]	r[1]	. . .	r[m-2]
 	R =	r[2]	r[1]	r[0]	. . .	r[m-3]
 		. . .	. . .	. . .	. . .	. . .
 		r[m-1]	r[m-2]  r[m-3]		r[0]
(See Geophysical Signal Analysis, Robinson and Treitel, page 163-169.)

Returns:
0 for success, -1 if r[0] is 0., -2 for a malloc error. logErrorMsg is called if the return is nonzero.
